column2:
"Thank you!
You were able to help me procure it
so soon!"

"Eh... what do you mean instruction
notes? Wow, what's this? It's covered
in heat ...?"

"Hmmm, is it alright to use this type of
food ingredient ...?"

"Anyway, since you have brought me
this ingredient, I will try to use it in
different ways."

"Thank you again!
I will need your help again when the
time comes!"

"ありがとう！
早速調達してきてくれたのね！"

"え……取扱い注意って？
うわっ、何これ、熱を帯びている……？"

"うーん、これって食材として使っても
大丈夫なのかな……？"

"とりあえず、あなたに調達して貰った
この食材を使って色々と試してみるわ。"

"今回もありがとう！
またなにかあったらよろしくね！"
